alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Pendleton; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 3:58PM EDT until August 25 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Robertson County in northern Kentucky... Bracken County in northern Kentucky... Northeastern Pendleton County in northern Kentucky... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 358 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Falmouth, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Falmouth, Brooksville, Mount Auburn, Browning Corner, Woolcutt, Neave, Milford, Berlin, Parina, Powersville, Lenoxburg, Santa Fe, Kincaid Lake State Park, Foster, Catawba, Johnsville, Petra, Chatham, and Willow Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
